name: Gewgot 2
description: Gewgot 2 is a remake/remaster/sequel/gritty retelling of everybody's FAVORITE game, Gewgot. The only difference is that Gewgot 2 is better, and also has many differences. Play as Insert, a red-hoodie wearing slime hunter, who hunts slimes for no discernible reason other than to provide you with entertainment! (Now in beta!)
